ComicInfo.Summary:
Back from the Unity Conflict, Phil goes back to pursuing a normal life. With the Edgewater plant shut down, Phil finds he has plenty of time to enjoy falling in love with Gayle all over again. But all the while, an investigator named Fred Bender is unraveling the secret that Phil Seleski is actually Solar! And when the man begins to hound him, Phil gives him a glimpse of the quantum continuum, only to have Bender steal a portion of his power!
1st appearance:
- Dr. Eclipse (Fred Bender)
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/solar-man-of-the-atom-14-rainbows-end/4000-36214/
